definition: to abandon/to relinquish/to discard/to throw away

sentences.english: That depended, Mr Hill said, on North Korea's future efforts towards denuclearisation.
sentences.chinese: 希爾說，那取決於朝鮮未來在棄核方向上的努力。

sentences.english: But that assumes China really can ensure North Korea disarms.
sentences.chinese: 不過這是假設中國真的可以確保朝鮮棄核。
